tipText: Describe your project as precisely as possible (property type, location, timeframe). This helps agents quickly assess whether a collaboration is a good fit.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about agent search

items.question: Does it cost anything to use MyHome24App to search for agents?
items.answer: Using MyHome24App to search for agents is free of charge for users. Any commission or fees are agreed directly with the agent.

items.question: How do I find agents in my region?
items.answer: Use the filters for city, region and specialisation. This way you quickly see who is active in your area and fits your project.

items.question: Are all agents verified?
items.answer: Verified agents are marked accordingly in their profiles. For them, details such as licence, contact data or affiliation with an agency have been checked.
